backend/main.mo: Actor importing and including a blob storage mixin to provide storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI label change involving AvoidButton.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for global light/dark styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main Valentine app component controlling UI, animations, and Yes/Avoid interactions.
frontend/src/components/AvoidButton.tsx: Button that moves to random positions on hover or touch and displays 'think about it'.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Generates animated floating heart particles for celebration animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Intentionally empty placeholder for backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles, theme variables, heart animations, and Polaroid frame animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point wiring providers and rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, including feature requests to rename a UI option and redeploy the updated site.
